GSD.product_version: versions from v3.5 to before v4.19.247
GSD.description:
ASoC: mxs-saif: Fix refcount leak in mxs_saif_probe

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.19.247 by commit 30d110ca703ce60162ec337aa564a3e4da30715f, it was introduced in version v3.5 by commit 08641c7c74dddfcd726512edfaa3b4cbe42e523e. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: ASoC: mxs-saif: Fix refcount leak in mxs_saif_probe
